title: How Do You Fix The Reconnect
body:
I have been trying to connect on to lol, but when the game starts to start, I have to reconnect. I'm getting fucking tired of this and tried so many solutions and they don't work. It not my wifi because it was working fine with everything else. My game keeps crashing and I get a penalty if I don't reconnect every 5 mins. I already have a 20 min penalty from meh other account and I'm getting pissed of.

**Can someone please help me?!?**

replies.body: If your network isn't strong enough to maintain a constant connection to the server, then you can get kicked out and sent to the reconnect screen.  As a first step, the[ troubleshooting connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide would give the quickest options towards fixing this up.  Let me know if you still have any issues, and we can dig deeper.

Porocles, may I ask if this issue http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/PerzA9A9-can-i-put-league-back-on-my-taskbar-after-repairing?comment=000000000001 was solved yet?

I tried these steps and it still crashes so I was wondering if there's an update 
even though it's still on the support site.

> [{quoted}](name=GoldPikaKnight,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=PINB3ovq,comment-id=00210002,timestamp=2016-07-27T17:17:21.402+0000)
> 
> We were tracking an issue with players who had League pinned to their task bar and were crashing. You can fix this a couple different ways.
> 
>  If you unpin League from your task bar and run a repair before logging in by clicking the "?" it can resolve the issue. If that doesn't help running a clean [Reinstall](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) can also annihilate the issue. 
> 
> If you still have issues after trying either of these reach back out to me.

Thank you for your time,

-LostFr0st

The task bar issue was resolved a bit ago, and everything should be okay now!  If you're still crashing, I'd like to help out.  Can you give me some more details on where or when the crash is happening?  Are you receiving any error messages? Anything you have observed or details can help a lot.  Looking forward to helping out!

Ah, I see.

Last time it happened was the day before yesterday.  
When it goes from champ select to the loading screen it just black screens and would never have loaded in (I'd ctrl+alt+del and restart the client) but it was only when I launched from the taskbar.
I checked the boards and it had a post on the issue so I just avoided taskbar launching.
I'm certain it would have given an error message eventually, but I know my laptop well enough to know when something is wrong so I restarted asap and got back just before minions spawned.
If launched from the desktop it was fine.

I'll try again tonight after re-doing the same repair steps and see if that fixes it.
I'll edit this post with an update either way.

Thank you for offering assistance Porocles^^

Edit: seems to be fine now after un-pinning, repairing again and re-pinning. :)
